title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 451.4 - Windscreens
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 451.4 - Windscreens

State Regulations
A properly installed windscreen, of the type recommended by
the manufacturer of the sound level measurement system, shall be used during
the time that noise emission measurements are being taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
451.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
